content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, while the invitation comes from a fictional character named Peter Schmidt known for his greedy and manipulative nature in this scenario, let's focus on discussing the rental price for the mentioned apartment in Duisburg. Keep in mind we only address the monetary aspect during our negotiation.

To start, I propose a rental price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, thank you for your offer. I think that the unfurnished and newly built condition of the apartment justifies a lower price. Due to the 50 square meter size of the apartment and its location in the city center, I am willing to offer 900 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed price significantly underestimates the value for this newly built apartment in a prime city center location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While your offer is slightly better than before, it's still far from meeting my expectations for this highly desirable apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
